Name: SteamCacheBundle
Overview: SteamcacheBundle provides DNS entries for *.cs.steampowered.com and other download URLs and has GenericCache server and SNIProxy in the built in.
ModeratorComment: Deprecated in favour of the lan cache bundle by Josh.5
CAComment: This template is set up to use a custom network. You may have to adjust the network or IP address etc to match your system

443.Description:
Container Port: 443
SNIProxy port, don't change!

LANCACHE_IP.Name: LANCACHE_IP
LANCACHE_IP.Description: IP Address of cache container. (Has to be the same as the HOST's IP. If you set the container's IP to 192.168.1.108 this has to be the same. If you use bridge it has to be the same as unRAID's IP.)

CACHE_MAX_AGE.Name: CACHE_MAX_AGE
CACHE_MAX_AGE.Description: Max age for files in the cache

USE_GENERIC_CACHE.Name: USE_GENERIC_CACHE
USE_GENERIC_CACHE.Description: Must be set to true to use generic cache

DISABLE_FRONTIER.Name: DISABLE_FRONTIER
DISABLE_FRONTIER.Description: Set to true to disable frontier caching

DISABLE_ORIGIN.Name: DISABLE_ORIGIN
DISABLE_ORIGIN.Description: Set to true to disable origin caching

DISABLE_RIOT.Name: DISABLE_RIOT
DISABLE_RIOT.Description: Set to true to disable riot caching

DISABLE_STEAM.Name: DISABLE_STEAM
DISABLE_STEAM.Description: Set to true to disable steam caching

DISABLE_UPLAY.Name: DISABLE_UPLAY
DISABLE_UPLAY.Description: Set to true to disable uplay caching

DISABLE_BLIZZARD.Name: DISABLE_BLIZZARD
DISABLE_BLIZZARD.Description: Set to true to disable blizzard caching

DISABLE_WINDOWS.Name: DISABLE_WINDOWS
DISABLE_WINDOWS.Description: Set to true to disable windows update caching

data.Name: data
data.Description: Location to store the cached files

Logs.Name: Logs
Logs.Description: Location to store the cache logs
